infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Fittbot Business needs access to the camera to capture display pictures, and upload images to the gym community feed section.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Fittbot Business requires access to your photo library to let you choose a display picture, and share visuals in the gym community feed.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Fittbot Business uses your microphone to let you record and share audio posts in the gym community feed, allowing members to share fitness thoughts or instructions.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app requires access to your contacts during referral program.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to your location only when setting up gym location for GPS based attendance for clients.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Fittbot Business to access your photo library so you can set a display picture, and post images to your gym's community feed.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Fittbot Business to use your camera for capturing profile pictures, and community feed posts.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: This app needs access to your location only when setting up gym location for GPS based attendance for clients.
